item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。随着华尔街准备迎接新的通胀数据，美国股市再创新高。特斯拉似乎将推出其机器人轴的原型。拉坦-塔塔去世，享年 86 岁。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. US stocks climb to another record high as Wall Street gears up for fresh inflation data. Tesla looks set to unveil prototypes for its robotaxis. And Ratan Tata has died at the age of 86. Here’s what’s moving markets. —Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 据英国电信报道，新加坡大厦以创纪录的 2.36 亿美元出售
item.description: 据《商业时报》报道，新加坡最高档社区的一栋豪宅正以 3.08 亿新元（约合人民币 2.36 亿元）的价格在市场上出售。【原文：A luxury mansion in Singapore’s most exclusive neighborhood is being put on the market for S$308 million ($236 million), according to the Business Times.】

item.title: 花旗银行经济学家称，如果借贷激增，吉尔伯特债券将面临买方罢工的风险
item.description: 花旗集团的一位经济学家表示，如果英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）再借贷数百亿美元用于投资，那么金边债券市场将面临 "买家罢工 "的风险。【原文：The gilt market faces the risk of a “buyers’ strike” if UK Chancellor Rachel Reeves borrows tens of billions more for investment, according to a Citigroup Inc. economist.】

item.title: 市场综述：美国股市创新高，亚洲股市将反弹
item.description: 在通胀数据可能确定美联储未来几个月的宽松政策之前，美国股市创下新高，亚洲股市周四有望上扬。【原文：Asian equities were primed to advance on Thursday after US stocks set a fresh high ahead of inflation data that may define Federal Reserve policy easing in the coming months.】

item.title: 美国会拆散谷歌吗？政府反垄断执法的利害关系
item.description: 今年夏天，Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司在其面临的最大反垄断挑战中败下阵来，美国法官认定其非法垄断了搜索市场。现在，谷歌面临的可能是公司被迫解体。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google lost the biggest antitrust challenge it has faced this summer when a US judge found that it illegally monopolized the search market. Now it’s facing the possibility that the result will be a forced breakup of the company.】

item.title: 特斯拉出售 7.83 亿美元 Prime 汽车租赁担保债务
item.description: 特斯拉公司在今年的第二笔资产支持证券交易中，向投资者出售了超过 7.83 亿美元的优质借款人租约。【原文：Tesla Inc. sold more than $783 million of prime borrower leases to investors in its second asset-backed securities deal of the year.】

item.title: RBC 财务总监 Nadine Ahn 被 Canaccord Genuity 聘用
item.description: Canaccord Genuity 集团公司聘请前加拿大皇家银行高管 Nadine Ahn 担任副首席财务官，并计划明年让她担任首席财务官。【原文：Canaccord Genuity Group Inc. hired former Royal Bank of Canada executive Nadine Ahn as deputy chief financial officer, with plans to move her into the CFO role next year.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔诺沃亚在每天停电的情况下任命新能源部长
item.description: 厄瓜多尔总统丹尼尔-诺沃亚（Daniel Noboa）在上任 10 个月内任命了第四位能源部长，因为在经历了数周瘫痪性停电后，政府不得不扩大每日停电范围。【原文：Ecuador’s president, Daniel Noboa, appointed a fourth energy minister in 10 months in office as the government had to expand daily blackouts even after weeks of crippling shutdowns.】

item.title: 海伦飓风后，以佛罗里达州为重点的保险公司面临米尔顿风险
item.description: 在飓风 "海伦 "袭击佛罗里达州两周之后，飓风 "米尔顿 "又一次袭击了该州的墨西哥湾沿岸地区。【原文：Florida-focused insurers are set to face further strain as Hurricane Milton bears down on the state’s Gulf Coast just two weeks after Helene battered the region.】

item.title: 里约通过并购进军锂市场
item.description: 早上好，我是悉尼的乔吉。以下是您今天需要了解的内容......今日必读：- 新西兰央行将现金利率下调半个百分点- 力拓将收购 Arcadium Lithium- 投资者瞄准与潮汐有关的公司【原文：Good morning, it's Georgie here in Sydney. Here’s what you need to know today...Today’s must-reads:• RBNZ lowers cash rate by half a percentage point• Rio Tinto to buy Arcadium Lithium• Investors target boomer-linked firms】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯称，鉴于风险，降息半点是 "审慎 "之举
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）表示，随着通胀率下降，经济更容易受到冲击，官员们上个月将利率下调半个百分点是 "审慎的"。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said it was “prudent” for officials to lower rates by a half percentage point last month as inflation declines and the economy becomes more vulnerable to shocks.】

item.title: 韩国债券融入市场获胜为市场注入活力
item.description: 由于期待已久的指数纳入以及对韩国央行将在本周降息的押注不断增加，韩国债券将在周四获得双重提振。【原文：South Korean bonds are set to get a double boost on Thursday, thanks to a long-awaited index inclusion and growing bets that the central bank will lower interest rates this week.】

item.title: Moove 美国首次公开募股推迟，巴西卷土重来受挫
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，巴西企业集团Cosan SA的子公司Moove润滑油控股公司推迟了原定于本周三进行的首次公开募股，原因是该公司难以拉动需求。【原文：Moove Lubricants Holdings, a subsidiary of Brazilian conglomerate Cosan SA, delayed an initial public offering set to price Wednesday after struggling to drum up demand, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 分析师称，Couche-Tard 无法提升 Seven &amp 公司；我的出价远高于 470 亿美元
item.description: 加拿大便利店运营商 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. 仍有余地以 470 亿美元收购 Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Canadian convenience store operator Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. still has room to increase its $47 billion bid for Seven & i Holdings Co., but any further boost is likely to be small, analysts say.】

item.title: 贝莱德称美国债券收益率在大跌后 "更接近公平水平
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：A sharp selloff in US Treasuries is helping the bond market’s valuations look more reasonable in the run-up to an unpredictable US election, according to BlackRock Inc.】

item.title: 加密货币公司在美国调查中被控操纵市场
item.description: 作为美国当局调查的一部分，三家加密货币公司和大约十几个人被指控操纵市场和欺诈，其中包括设立虚假的加密货币公司和数字代币。【原文：Three cryptocurrency companies and about a dozen individuals were charged with market manipulation and fraud as part of an investigation by US authorities that included setting up a fake crypto firm and digital token.】

item.title: 加拿大绿色分类不可能包括新的天然气站点
item.description: 加拿大更加明确了它所认为的本土绿色投资；新的天然气项目不太可能入选。【原文：Canada has provided more clarity on what it considers to be homegrown green investments — with new natural gas projects unlikely to make the cut.】

item.title: SPAC Star Lavoro 受巴西农场路线影响，目前正在寻求现金
item.description: 巴西化肥销售商 Lavoro Ltd.以收购为动力的扩张使其搭上了农业繁荣的顺风车，但在农民、分销商和投资者都被化肥行业普遍不景气的大环境下，该公司目前正在寻求投资者注入现金。【原文：Lavoro Ltd., a Brazilian fertilizer seller whose acquisition-fueled expansion helped it ride an agricultural boom, is now seeking investors for a cash injection amid a broader slump in the sector that has engulfed farmers, distributors and investors.】

item.title: 加拿大统计局解决贸易数据延迟后的网络中断问题
item.description: 加拿大统计局的网站在周二发生故障导致国际贸易数据延迟半小时后已恢复正常。【原文：Statistics Canada’s website is back to normal following an outage that led to the half-hour delay of international trade data on Tuesday.】

item.title: 芝加哥市议会推迟 15 亿美元再融资投票
item.description: 芝加哥市议会周三推迟了对市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）提出的 15 亿美元债券交易的投票。【原文：The Chicago City Council on Wednesday deferred a vote on Mayor Brandon Johnson’s proposed $1.5 billion bond deal, a transaction intended to help close back-to-back shortfalls.】

item.title: B.莱利贷款人每周在修订后的贷款中获得最新流动性信息
item.description: B.Riley Financial Inc. 的贷款人对该公司的财务状况有了更多的监督，包括每周更新其流动性和部分交易情况，以努力使这家亏损的投资公司摆脱困境。【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc.’s lenders are getting more oversight of the company’s finances, including weekly updates on its liquidity and some of its dealmaking amid efforts to pull the money-losing investment firm out of its tailspin.】

item.title: 500 亿美元基金经理 Impax 称英伟达价值仍被低估
item.description: 今年早些时候，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）遭遇大幅抛售，而 Impax Asset Management 则悄然抓住这一时机，增持了其长期以来一直后悔没有持有的股份。【原文：As Nvidia Corp. found itself the target of a deep selloff earlier this year, Impax Asset Management was quietly seizing the moment to build a stake it had long regretted not owning.】

item.title: 苹果公司乔布斯和库克时代的关键高管丹-里奇奥即将退休
item.description: 苹果公司的丹-里奇奥（Dan Riccio）即将退休，他负责监督公司在混合现实头戴设备领域的推进工作，此前曾担任苹果公司的硬件工程主管。【原文：Apple Inc.’s Dan Riccio, who oversaw the company’s push into mixed-reality headsets and previously served as its hardware engineering chief, is retiring.】

item.title: Pinnacle 支持的小盘股经理人在朱棣文的加拿大交易中大获全胜
item.description: 加拿大投资公司 Langdon Equity Partners Ltd. 成为 Blackstone 长期交易员 Chinh Chu 支持的交易的大赢家之一。【原文：Canadian investment firm Langdon Equity Partners Ltd. has emerged as one of the big winners from a deal backed by longtime Blackstone dealmaker Chinh Chu.】

item.title: 美联储降息希望在 CPI 前减弱，国债收益率上升
item.description: 美国国债收益率上升，原因是在周四公布通胀数据之前，交易员放弃了对美联储今年进一步降息的押注。【原文：US Treasury yields rose as traders nixed bets on additional Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year ahead of inflation data to be released on Thursday.】

item.title: 印度最大企业集团的创始人拉坦-塔塔逝世，享年 86 岁
item.description: 拉坦-塔塔（Ratan Tata）是一位商人，他继承了印度历史最悠久的企业集团之一，并通过一系列引人注目的交易将其转变为一个全球帝国。享年 86 岁。【原文：Ratan Tata, the businessman who inherited one of India’s oldest conglomerates and transformed it through a string of eye-catching deals into a global empire, has died. He was 86.】

item.title: 里约以适者生存的心态进军锂业
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Plc）在锂电池金属价格断崖式暴跌后大举进军锂市场，打赌自己可以建立一个庞大、低成本的矿山组合，从而战胜实力较弱的竞争对手。【原文：Rio Tinto Plc is muscling in on the lithium market after a precipitous price collapse for the battery metal, betting it can build a portfolio of huge, low-cost mines that will outlast weaker rivals.】

item.title: 阿达尼旗舰公司希望通过出售股份筹集 5 亿美元资金
item.description: 印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的旗舰公司寻求通过向机构出售股份筹集约 5 亿美元资金，这标志着该公司在 2023 年遭遇卖空报告凋零后重返股权筹资领域。【原文：Indian billionaire Gautam Adani’s flagship firm seeks to raise about $500 million through a share sale to institutions, marking a return to equity fundraising after a withering short-seller report in 2023.】

item.title: 套现潮一代吸引投资者，澳大利亚年轻人承担起重任
item.description: 投资者正在抢购面向全国套现退休人员的澳大利亚股票，而避开面向年轻家庭的公司，这是代际财富鸿沟不断扩大的一种表现。【原文：Investors are snapping up Australian stocks geared to the nation’s cashed-up retirees while shunning firms exposed to younger households, in a play on a widening intergenerational wealth divide.】

item.title: 投资者呼吁在 Europastry IPO 中给予同行更大折扣
item.description: Europastry SA 已停止首次公开募股，该公司的一位潜在投资者呼吁，在定价上应比该公司的一家上市同行有更严格的折扣。【原文：A prospective investor in Europastry SA’s halted initial public offering called for a tighter pricing discount to one of the company’s listed peers.】
